For those with the patch not working uninstall and re-install without changing the install location, it's a poorly written patch that only works from default install location. Then I guess if u need to try copying Vegas Pro 12 folder somewhere uninstalling and reinstalling then put the copy onto of the new install, beware I haven't tried this myself it may not work.

Update:  Tested my suggestion of copying working default patched install location to a new install in a different location and it doesn't work. Well if u wanted to spend hrs going through registry u might get it working but since the install is aprox half a GB its not worth worrying about, cause if u don't have that much space on a HDD you need to do a clean up and if u have less space than that on an SSD your damaging it never fill them past 80% capacity it shortens their lifespans.
